content: Head through the door on the right when you enter the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. Run up the stairs and turn to the left to find yourself face-to-face with the Snake Sheriff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snake_Sheriff_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Snake Sheriff Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Sheriff Location'.
The content is as follows:
Head through the door on the right when you enter the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. Run up the stairs and turn to the left to find yourself face-to-face with the Snake Sheriff.
